com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Class LoggerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.LoggerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class LoggerManager
extends BaseComponent
    Manages and keeps track of Logger and ReplicationServer instances.

    Manages the creation and deletion of loggers and creation of replication servers. Events are mapped into these actions.

      • getMatchingLogger

        public static Logger getMatchingLogger(String domain,
                                       String hostName,
                                       String applicationName,
                                       String loggerName)
        get the matching log-replication-client's logger against the passed frontend logger details.
        Parameters:
        domain - logger mbean domain.
        hostName - logger hostname.
        applicationName - logger application name.
        loggerName - logger name.
        Returns:
        The matching log replication client logger object.
